company_name: Moshe Tabo - Long-term Care Insurance Attorney

vision.mission: Provide expert, personal representation for policyholders in long-term care (LTC) insurance claims against all major insurers in Israel.
vision.narrative: Attorney Moshe Tabo specializes in LTC insurance claims with 15+ years of experience, offering hands-on guidance and representation to maximize policyholder rights when insurers deny or underpay benefits.

products_services.name: LTC insurance claim representation
products_services.description: End-to-end handling of private long-term care insurance claims, from initial assessment to filing, negotiations, and appeals.
key_features: Representation vs. all major insurers (Harel, Menora, Clal, Migdal, etc.)

products_services.name: Consultation on LTC policy and rights
products_services.description: One-on-one consultation to review policy terms, eligibility, claim steps, and documentation expectations.

business_model.notes: Exact fees depend on case complexity and stage; provided after initial consultation.

alternatives: Filing claim independently with the insurer
Getting help from the insurance agent

value_props: Experience with all major Israeli insurers

goals.primary_objective: Increase qualified consultations and signed LTC claim cases

compliance_notes: Avoid guarantees of outcomes; adhere to Israel Bar advertising rules.
